participant_1.background:
I'm working hard to save up for my dream restaurant while dating my new love.
I would love to learn more about sports nutrition so I can help my son improve his game.
I love seeing how my designs are used to create real products that people love.
i am constantly drinking.
I once ate an entire head of broccoli while the police officer waited for me to sign my ticket.

i try to do my job as best as i can.

i owe two laptops.
i have male pattern baldness.

content.text: I'm doing great, thanks for asking! How about yourself?
I'm doing well, thanks! I'm just working on my design for a new restaurant.
That's awesome! I love to cook, so I'm always interested in new restaurant ideas.
Thanks! I'm really excited about it. I've been working on it for a few months now, and I think it's finally coming together.
That's awesome! I'm sure it'll be a huge success.
Thanks, I hope so! I'm really passionate about it, so I'm hoping it will do well.
I'm sure it will! What kind of food will it be?
It's going to be a Mediterranean restaurant. I love Mediterranean food, so I'm excited to be able to share it with others.
That sounds delicious! I love Mediterranean food too.
Me too! I think it's the perfect cuisine for a restaurant. It's healthy, fresh, and flavorful.
It really is. I'm definitely going to have to come check it out when it opens!
Awesome! I'll be sure to let you know when it does
